alert.note: Alert for Eastern Curry County and Josephine County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 19 at 2:04PM PDT until October 20 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 34 could result in frost formation. * WHERE...Portions of the Illinois Valley. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest chance of widespread frost are located in the lowest portions of the valley. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Curry County and Josephine County
